examples: Health services are lining the drug companies’ pockets, according to the report.
The presence of green algae in water bodies can indicate the health and balance of the ecosystem.
Years of smoking and drinking has taken a toll on her health.
Support your thyroid health by incorporating bladderwrack supplements into your daily routine.
Public education campaigns highlight potential health risks of consuming pink slime products.
words.defineEn: the general condition of a person's mind or body
words.defineVi: tình trạng chung của tâm trí hoặc cơ thể của một người

examples: The gymnast effortlessly bent her body into a graceful arch during her routine.
Under stress, the body produces adrenalin.
The doctor examined her body to check for any signs of illness or injury.
The demonstrators marched in a body to the main square.
He dedicated himself body and soul to the education of young men.
words.defineEn: our or an animal's hands, legs, head, and every other part together
words.defineVi: tay, chân, đầu và mọi bộ phận khác của chúng ta hoặc động vật cùng với nhau

examples: Our hearts go out to the families of the victims of this terrible tragedy.
They never lost heart, even in the face of adversity.
They pour out their hearts to God.
Please, open your hearts to these poor people.
And now the poor thing is crying his heart out.
words.defineEn: the body part that pushes the blood to go to all parts of our body
words.defineVi: bộ phận cơ thể đẩy máu đi đến tất cả các bộ phận của cơ thể chúng ta

examples: She cooked the chicken liver with onions and served it as an appetizer.
I read an article about the potential benefits of quassia in improving liver health.
He decided to try a traditional dish that featured a mix of variety meats, including liver, heart, and tripe.
The liver sausage spread on crackers was a tasty appetizer for the party.
The liver sausage and onion omelette offered a rich and satisfying breakfast choice.
words.defineEn: a large organ in the body that produces bile and cleans the blood
words.defineVi: một cơ quan lớn trong cơ thể sản xuất mật và làm sạch máu

examples: I noticed the cow's strong muscles as it moved around.
The Council flexes their muscles to show they mean business.
The Fair Trade Commission has of late been flexing its muscles, cracking down on cases of corruption.
I massaged my leg to relieve muscle tension.
He performed knee exercises to strengthen the muscles around the joint.
words.defineEn: a piece of body tissue that is made tight or relaxed when we want to move a particular part of our body
words.defineVi: một mảnh mô cơ thể được làm căng hoặc thả lỏng khi chúng ta muốn di chuyển một phần cụ thể của cơ thể

examples: A white blouse will show the blood.
Blue blood is no guarantee of any particular merit, competence, or expertise.
The nurse takes my blood pressure.
My aunt and I are related by blood.
The heart pumps blood throughout the body to provide oxygen and nutrients.
words.defineEn: the red liquid that the heart pumps through the body, carrying oxygen to and carbon dioxide from the tissues
words.defineVi: chất lỏng màu đỏ mà tim bơm qua cơ thể, mang oxy đến và carbon dioxide từ các mô

examples: He makes no bones about his feelings towards the militants.
A fire attack shall chill the enemy to the bone.
Sticks and stones may break my bones, but my positive attitude will never falter.
That chilled me to the bone.
He lined up the bones and set the arm.
words.defineEn: any of the hard pieces making up the skeleton in humans and some animals
words.defineVi: bất kỳ mảnh cứng nào tạo nên bộ xương ở người và một số động vật

examples: Our waitress poured water for everyone at the table.
Water will always find its own level.
My mother waters the plants in our garden every morning.
Police turned water cannon on the rioters.
The water boiled away.
words.defineEn: a liquid with no smell, taste, or color, that falls from the sky as rain, and we use for washing, cooking, drinking, etc.
words.defineVi: một chất lỏng không mùi, không vị, không màu, từ trên trời rơi xuống dưới dạng mưa, và chúng ta dùng để giặt giũ, nấu ăn, uống, v.v.

examples: He followed a strict diet.
She valued the high nutritional content and low-calorie nature of asparagus in his diet.
We existed on a diet of rice.
She includes thin slices of celery in her diet.
They lived frugally off a diet of beans and lentils.
words.defineEn: the types of food or drink that people or animals usually consume
words.defineVi: các loại thực phẩm hoặc đồ uống mà người hoặc động vật thường tiêu thụ

examples: Can I get a Coke?
Can I have a Coke, please?
Coke produced a slew of other new innovations too.
They've stuck Coke cans.
According to one analyst, Coke has more exposure to restaurants like McDonald's and sports venues than its peers PepsiCo or Keurig Dr. Pepper.
words.defineEn: a brand of carbonated soft drink that comes in a variety of flavors and is typically dark in color
words.defineVi: một nhãn hiệu nước ngọt có ga có nhiều hương vị khác nhau và thường có màu sẫm

examples: Did alcohol have a part in causing the accident?
They discovered sugar alcohol as a great alternative to sugar while following their ketogenic diet.
If possible, you want to avoid alcohol.
She recommends sugar alcohol to her friend who is trying to reduce his sugar intake but still craves something sweet.
Getting arrested twice for drunk driving shows you've got a problem with alcohol.
words.defineEn: any drink that can make people drunk, such as wine, beer, etc.
words.defineVi: bất kỳ đồ uống nào có thể làm cho người ta say, chẳng hạn như rượu, bia, v.v.

words.defineEn: milk that has a low percentage of fat
words.defineVi: sữa có tỷ lệ chất béo thấp

examples: Spill the tea!
The aromatic wintergreen tea soothes her sore throat.
A cup of tea sounds perfect.
The restaurant served tea accompanied by delicate sugar lumps on the side.
Do you want some more tea?
words.defineEn: a hot drink that is made by soaking dried leaves, called tea leaves, in hot water
words.defineVi: một thức uống nóng được làm bằng cách ngâm lá khô, được gọi là lá trà, trong nước nóng

examples: The diamond thief double-crossed his partners and gave them only worthless fake jewels.
My mom stuffs pimientos with cream cheese and serves them as an appetizer at parties.
"And pigs can fly!"
I discovered the delightful combination of pawpaw and coconut in a tropical fruit salad.
The child jumped up and down with excitement.
words.defineEn: used to connect two words, phrases, or sentences referring to related things
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để kết nối hai từ, cụm từ hoặc câu đề cập đến những điều liên quan

examples: She made coffee for us all.
The coffee in the mug was a dark.
The coffee table was a dark wood color.
Surprisingly, the little café had the best coffee in town.
The little café had, surprisingly, the best coffee in town.
words.defineEn: a drink that is made from mixing water with some crushed seeds, called coffee beans, usually hot and brown in color
words.defineVi: một thức uống được làm từ nước trộn với một số hạt nghiền nhỏ, được gọi là hạt cà phê, thường nóng và có màu nâu

words.defineEn: a drink that is made by extracting the liquid that exists inside of fruits
words.defineVi: một thức uống được làm bằng cách chiết xuất chất lỏng tồn tại bên trong trái cây

examples: That DJ's voice really sets my teeth on edge.
He sank his teeth into an apple.
He gritted his teeth in anger.
Their teeth are sharp enough to break the skin.
Their teeth are sharp enough to break the skin.
words.defineEn: one of the things in our mouth that are hard and white and we use to chew and bite food with
words.defineVi: một trong những thứ cứng và trắng trong miệng của chúng ta và chúng ta dùng để nhai và cắn thức ăn bằng
